types.html:
aller chercher

  1. to fetch, to go and get
    aller chercher un verre
    grab a drink
  2. to pick up (someone)
    J’irai te chercher à la gare.
    I’ll pick you up at the station.
  3. Used other than figuratively or idiomatically: see aller,‎ chercher.
    • 1885, Alexandre Dumas (fils), Denise, Calmann-Lévy, →OCLC, page 124:
      Rien ! je n'ai rien trouvé, et vous ? […] je vais chercher encore...
      Nothing! I found nothing, and you? […] I am going to look again...
trans: to fetch, to go and get
Used other than figuratively or idiomatically: see aller,‎ chercher.

title: aller chercher
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /a.le ʃɛʁ.ʃe/
